channel.title: Need Help with something
channel.description:
Ok, so I want to make... well for Example, a RS2 Stats Signature... Or something like that.
A .jpg, .gif, or any of those, that will load numbers or letters/words from the web... So if anyone can help... I can give you a EG
[img]http://www.dodian.com/sigs/Carazon.png[/img]
Liek this! This auto updates... So if I were to grow a level in the game it will add it here, in 30 seconds or less, anyone help?

item.title: Need Help with something
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:7, topic:141803”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=194134.msg1750358#msg1750358 date=1189570380]

Jagex’s Highscores is constantly updating. It updates a character’s stats every time they log out, so it’s always updating, because there’s always people logging out.

Where did you get that information?
[/quote]I figured it out when I’ve monitored the highscores before and nothing updated for some people until they logged out, and then it updated for them. So I figured that Runescape doesn’t send the person’s stat information to the highscores until they log out.[/quote]Tis true, I’ve noticed it as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with something
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:6, topic:141803”][quote author=Sick of Air link=topic=194134.msg1750347#msg1750347 date=1189570102]
Jagex’s Highscores is constantly updating. It updates a character’s stats every time they log out, so it’s always updating, because there’s always people logging out.
[/quote]

Where did you get that information?[/quote]I figured it out when I’ve monitored the highscores before and nothing updated for some people until they logged out, and then it updated for them. So I figured that Runescape doesn’t send the person’s stat information to the highscores until they log out.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with something
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Sick of Air:

Jagex’s Highscores is constantly updating. It updates a character’s stats every time they log out, so it’s always updating, because there’s always people logging out.

Where did you get that information?

item.title: Need Help with something
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:4, topic:141803”]@ Fastbawlz/therealjdb, could you move this to the Web Design section? I nearly didn’t find this.

Carazon, I could do that in PHP for you. Give me the specifications, and I’ll make it for you tomorrow afternoon (20 hours from this post). Give me ANY and ALL images relevant, i.e. all the skill images and a background image. Give me a font(s) to use.

I’m not exactly sure about updating w/i 30 seconds because I’m not sure how often Jagex updates the hiscores list.[/quote]
Jagex’s Highscores is constantly updating. It updates a character’s stats every time they log out, so it’s always updating, because there’s always people logging out.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with something
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

@ Fastbawlz/therealjdb, could you move this to the Web Design section? I nearly didn’t find this.

[size=15pt]Carazon, I could do that in PHP for you.[/size] Give me the specifications, and I’ll make it for you tomorrow afternoon (20 hours from this post). Give me ANY and ALL images relevant, i.e. all the skill images and a background image. Give me a font(s) to use.

I’m not exactly sure about updating w/i 30 seconds because I’m not sure how often Jagex updates the hiscores list.

Read full topic
